text: Brian Nolan (born November 28, 1979) is an American actor and producer, best known for starring as Frankie on all current seasons of Here! TV’s The Lair. Nolan has appeared on the Disney Channel's Hannah Montana, Nickelodeon’s iCarly , and in numerous television films, as well as the independent films Role/Play, Abner, The Invisible Dog, and Showgirls 2 Nolan has worked extensively as both a producer and unit production manager on multiple films for television. He is a graduate of the University of Central Florida, where he majored in theater. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year(s) !! Title !! Role !!
